extensionDescription.message: Aggregate new tabs to a window which has most many tabs and largest size.

config_redirectLoadingInCurrentTabMinWin.message: Treat windows as Sidebar Only Window if smaller than
px width, and open new tab in the main window when any URL is loaded in the current tab of a Sidebar Only Window

config_aggregateTabsFromMatched_caption.message: Opened from a tab having its URL matching to the regular expression:

config_doNotAggregateTabsFromMatched_cap.message: Don't aggregate if it is matched to the regular expression:

config_aggregateTabsMatched_caption.message: Opened with a URL matching to the regular expression:

config_doNotAggregateTabsMatched_caption.message: Don't aggregate if it is matched to the regular expression:

config_aggregateTabsAll_caption.message: Any other case (tabs from external applications, etc.)
